list.heading: MRM Reminder of Important Dates
list.description_en: Server application that notifies you of important dates.
list.description_sk: Serverová aplikácia, ktorá vás upozorňuje na dôležité dátumy.

list.heading: Simple Chat Project
list.description_en: Simple and unencrypted python chat application with gui and cli version.
list.description_sk: Jednoduchá a nešifrovaná aplikácia python chat s verziou gui a cli.
